subject: Big Brown (Race Horse)
Belmont Stakes
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horse Racing
Horses
lead_paragraph: Kent Desormeaux has twice ridden horses to the verge of the Triple Crown. First Real Quiet, now Big Brown — two horses, two Belmont Stakes, two very different losses.
snippet: Kent Desormeaux has twice ridden horses to the verge of the Triple Crown. First Real Quiet, now Big Brown — two horses, two Belmont Stakes, two very different losses.
